name: Survive the Sun
description:
SURVIVE THE SUN

In a world of everlasting day ruled by the Sun, the birth of the prophetic "shadowflame" mage is a threat to be eliminated.

But just because you were born different shouldn't meant a sentence of death. Right...?

Controls

W/A/S/D - Move

Mouse Cursor - Move to Aim

LMB - Shoot

Space - Special Attack

ESC - Pause Game

Other Stuff (to know)

☀️ You are trying to survive twelve minutes
☀️ Your health (Flame) is also your ammo
☀️ Defeated monsters will drop Flame, but these drops can disappear after a set amount of time
☀️ It costs 1 Flame to shoot, and 10 Flame to use the Special
☀️ The charge bar for your Special Attack fills up based on enemies killed—not by drops
☀️ You can have up to 3 charges of your Special Attack
